page.title: 13EDUCATION(MOWDEN HALL)
page.content: When the school closes for the summer holiday the building does not remain empty and unused.Groups may hire the premises for various uses,one such being the{Salvation Army Youth}who come every year for a period of fun and study in congenial surroundings. For the last few years a local firm of fine art{auctioneers}has held a 3 day auction of{antiques}at the school in September.This benefits the auction_ eers,the sellers of the items and the school.1985 had a particularly fine lot of old{toys and dolls,}some of which went for very high prices. Other fund raising events at the school include a summer fete,which has become very up to date by charging parents and visitors to play games on the{school computers.}Â£3000 was raised in 1984 much of this being spent on a minibus for expeditions and outings.
